meanings.definition: The quality or state of being virtuous.
meanings.sent1: Her virtuousnesses shone through in her kind actions.
meanings.sent2: His virtuousnesses were evident in the way he always helped others.
meanings.sent3: The virtuousnesses of the hero saved the day in the story.
meanings.sent4: The virtuousnesses of the community were like a beacon of light in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The virtuousnesses of the teacher inspired her students to be better people.

meanings.sent1: Practicing virtuousnesses daily can lead to a happier life.
meanings.sent2: The virtuousnesses of the monks were admired by all who knew them.
meanings.sent3: The virtuousnesses of the chef were evident in the delicious meals he prepared.
meanings.sent4: Her virtuousnesses in cooking were like magic in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The virtuousnesses of the team led them to victory in the competition.

meanings.sent1: His virtuousnesses in following the rules made him a trustworthy person.
meanings.sent2: The virtuousnesses of the student council ensured fairness in decisions.
meanings.sent3: The virtuousnesses of the detective helped solve the mystery in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her virtuousnesses in honesty were like a shield against deception.
meanings.sent5: The virtuousnesses of the leader guided the team to success.
